verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I will enter His gates with thanksgiving
I will enter His courts with praise
I will lift up a song of worship
I will bless His holy name

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Our Lord God is so holy
Mighty in all of His ways
Our Lord God is so worthy
Worthy of all our praise

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He is the One Who has given
Given my heart a brand new song
I will sing to Him in worship
Praising Him all day long

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
I will lift up a song of worship
I will bless His holy name
I will enter His gates with Thanksgiving
I will bless His Holy name
